channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere Portal

item.title: CVE-2018-1361|2024-09-16T19:30:09.270Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 137158.

item.title: CVE-2017-1698|2024-09-16T19:41:18.742Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could reveal sensitive information from an error message that could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 124390.

item.title: CVE-2018-1445|2024-09-16T20:23:01.048Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 8.0.0 through 8.0.0.1, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 139907.

item.title: CVE-2018-1483|2024-09-16T18:28:40.201Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 140918.

item.title: CVE-2017-1536|2024-09-16T22:45:25.465Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM Support Tools for Lotus WCM (IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5 and 9.0) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 130733.

item.title: CVE-2018-1420|2024-09-16T17:47:39.664Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 resets access control settings to the out of the box configuration during Combined Cumulative Fix (CF) installation. This can lead to security miss-configuration of the installation. IBM X-Force ID: 138950.

item.title: CVE-2017-1303|2024-09-16T17:53:12.009Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal and Web Content Manager 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125457.

item.title: CVE-2018-1416|2024-09-16T18:03:04.138Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 138822.

item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting.
